p.s: Event-driven asynchronous and concurrent networking engine with high performance for PHP.
p.d: Event-driven asynchronous and concurrent networking engine with high performance for PHP. - event-driven - coroutine - asynchronous non-blocking - multi-thread reactor - multi-process worker - multi-protocol - millisecond timer - built-in tcp/http/websocket/http2 server - coroutine tcp/http/websocket client - coroutine read/write file system - coroutine dns lookup - support IPv4/IPv6/UnixSocket/TCP/UDP - support SSL/TLS encrypted transmission
